settings.heading: Shipping Policy
settings.content:
At East Texas Electronics LLC, we strive to provide timely and affordable shipping options for our customers. The following outlines our shipping policy:

  • Packages weighing under 15.6 oz will be shipped via USPS Retail and should arrive within 3-5 business days from the date of shipment.
  • Media items, such as books, CDs, DVDs, and other similar products, will be sent via USPS Media Mail and should arrive within 3-5 business days from the date of shipment.
  • Packages weighing over 15.6 oz may be shipped via FedEx, UPS, or USPS, depending on which carrier can offer the most reasonable rate at the time of shipment. The shipping method chosen will be at our discretion, but we will always aim to select the most cost-effective option for our customers.

Once your order has been shipped, we will provide you with a tracking number, so you can track your package's progress and delivery status. We typically ship all orders within 1-2 business days of receiving them. However, please note that shipping times may vary based on the carrier and your location.

We do not offer international shipping at this time, and we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

If you have any questions or concerns about our shipping policy, please do not hesitate to contact us.

settings.heading: Returns & Refunds
settings.content:
East Texas Electronics LLC - Returns and Refunds Policy

Filing a Return Claim:

  • Online: Log in to your store account, select the item from your orders, and click "Return Item".
  • Email: Contact us at Contact@EastTexasElectronics.com.
  • Process: Our team will review the return and contact you with further instructions. In some cases, photo or video evidence of the issue may be requested.

Shipping Damage:

Report immediately. Provide photos or videos of the packaging as received, if possible, to assist in shipping claims.

Refurbished Products:

Used devices that have undergone cleaning, inspection, and necessary repairs.

Returns:

14-day return policy. Buyer covers shipping unless the item is defective or not as described.

Warranty:

90-day warranty.

Refurbished Video Game Consoles:

Similar to refurbished products, specifically for game consoles.

Returns:

14-day return policy for unmodified systems. Same shipping policy as refurbished products.

Warranty:

180-day warranty.

Used Products:

Functional products in varying conditions.

Returns:

No returns for regret of purchase. Free return/exchange if the item is not as described.

Warranty:

30-day warranty.

New Products:

Brand new products, packaging may vary.

Returns:

Returns due to regret subject to a 10%-25% restocking fee. Free return/exchange if the item is not as described.

Warranty:

30-day warranty from us, plus manufacturer's warranty if applicable.

Open Box Items:

Unused items without original packaging.

Returns:

Returns due to regret subject to a 5%-15% restocking fee. Free return/exchange if the item is not as described.

Warranty:

30-day warranty from us, plus manufacturer's warranty if applicable.

For Parts / Untested Items:

Items sold as-is, may be non-functional or untested.

Returns:

No returns accepted, except for items not as described.

Warranty:

No warranty provided.

Gift Cards:

Gift cards are non-refundable and cannot be exchanged for cash. No returns or exchanges are allowed for gift card purchases.

Additional Policies:

Discretionary Returns:

Returns are at the discretion of East Texas Electronics LLC. We reserve the right to handle each return on a case-by-case basis.

Condition of Returned Items:

Items must be returned in their original condition, including all accessories, manuals, and packaging.

Restocking Fee Clarification:

The restocking fee is determined based on the condition of the returned item, the type of product, and the reason for the return.

Timeframe for Processing Returns:

Returns are typically processed within 1-3 business days after submission.

Limitation of Liability:

Our liability is limited to the value of the product purchased. We are not responsible for any additional damages or claims.

Amendments to the Policy:

East Texas Electronics LLC reserves the right to amend this policy at any time.

Dispute Resolution:

In the event of a dispute, we encourage contacting us directly for resolution. We may consider mediation or arbitration as steps before litigation.

Proof of Purchase:

A receipt or proof of purchase is required for all returns.

General Notes:

Restocking Fee: Determined on a per-product basis at our discretion.

Eligibility for Free Returns/Exchanges: Only if items do not match their description.
